Judul: GENERATION Y'S NEED AND EXPECT FROM EMPLOYER AND WHAT THEY WANT FROM AN ORGANIZATION
Abstrak: According to it, generation Y cannot perform its duty well, request larger salary, want a promotion even they just start working for one year and demand to be allowed to work in flexible working time. They grow up in a world that is controlled by technology, where values and norms have changed and they often run in the different perspective than the previous generation.
Kata Kunci: Work/Life Balance, Workplace Culture, Varied Job Role, Management style and Reward Talent and hard work.
